Title: NUC approves medicine, surgery programme at Mudiame University
Summary: The National Universities Commission has approved the establishment of a full-time Bachelor of Medicine, Bachelor of Surgery (MBBS) programme at Mudiame University, Irrua, Edo State, marking a major milestone in the institution's mission to bridge Nigeria’s critical gap in education .

Title: Kwara govt returns out-of-school children to classrooms in Mooro
Summary: Kwara State Government has expressed commitment to invest in the education sector . Kwara govt returns out-of-school children to classrooms in Mooro .

Title: Nigeria can meet UN standard for inmates’ care with Tunji-Ojo’s reforms – Rivers APC
Summary: APC has praised the Minister of Interior, Dr. Olubunmi for spearheading the most significant reforms in the history of the ministry .

Title: NAHCON inaugurates aviation monitoring committee for 2026 Hajj
Summary: NAHCON inaugurates aviation monitoring committee for 2026 Hajj operations . Chairman and Chief Executive Officer of the National Hajj Commission of Nigeria, Professor Abdullahi Saleh Usman, inaugurated the Aviation Monitoring Committee . The inauguration took place at the Commission's Board Room, Hajj .

Title: Dembele returns for PSG after six weeks out
Summary: Ballon d'Or winner Ousmane Dembele returns for PSG after six weeks out . PSG face Bayer Leverkusen in the Champions League on Tuesday night . Demebele has been sidelined for six weeks with a knee injury .

Title: Ogun releases flood alert, urges residents to relocate
Summary: Ogun State Government urges residents living in riverbank and wetland areas to prepare for the overflow of Ogun River in the next two weeks . This is contained in a flood alert released by the Commissioner for Environment, Mr Ola Oresanya, in Abeokuta .

Title: #FreeNnamdiKanuprotest: Sowore can’t pull stunts to free terror suspects in America, Europe – Tinubu’s aide
Summary: Presidential aide Sunday Dare has warned activist Omoyele Sowore and his supporters against using protests and inflammatory rhetoric to influence the Nnamdi Kanu trial . Dare has also warned the activist not to pull stunts to free terror suspects in America, Europe – Tinubu's aide .

Title: Tinubu applauds Olukoyede for notable asset recovery, conviction records
Summary: Tinubu applauds Olukoyede leadership of the EFCC for achieving new heights in asset recovery and convictions . President Bola  Ahmed Tasey praised Olukyede for notable asset recovery, conviction records . Olukeyede has been in charge of EFCC since 2007 .

Title: Nigeria can meet UN standards for inmate care under Tunji-Ojo, says APC Chieftain
Summary: The Minister of Interior, Dr. Olubunmi Tunji-Ojo, is leading what he described as the most significant, ambitious, and impactful reforms in the history of Nigeria’s correctional services . Spokesperson for the All Progressives Congress, APC, in Rivers State, Darlington Nwauju

Title: NLC gives FG 4 weeks to resolve tertiary education crisis
Summary: NLC President gave the ultimatum at an emergency news conference on Monday in Abuja . He said the decision followed an extensive meeting with unions in the tertiary institutions .
